entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • wasm System.Reflection.MemberInfo.ToString() returns different string for some types in public field compare to desktop #88637
  • Faster Object.GetType #88631
    Future
  • [coreclr] calling a constructor via an UnmanagedCallersOnly UnsafeAccessor crashes #88629
  • Frozen collection tests fail on NativeAOT #88628
  • Android: AOT compiler fails in directory named `BuildAot AndÜmläüts` #88625
  • Update trimming tests to use live-built ILLink.Targets logic #88624
  • CHECK: expected string not found in input #88622
  • Assertion failed 'distVal <= CALL_DIST_MAX_POS' in 'CseTest.Test_Main:TestEntryPoint():int' during 'Emit code' #88621
  • jit-cfg pipline gc stress failure on linux x64 #88618
  • Source Generated interop should warn when a user puts `[OutAttribute]` on a `string` and suggest `[Out] char[]` #88617
  • Fuzzlyn failure on linux arm64 #88616
  • System.IO.Directory invalid parsing for directorie names ending with a dot #88615
  • [wasm] Perf benchmark failures - `System.Text.Json` serializer related failures #88610
    8.0.0
  • Move BackgroundService implementation from StartAsync to the new StartedAsync #88605
  • Validate StartAsync() exception semantics for Starting, Start, Started #88603
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT: exportable static fields support #88598
  • InMemoryDirectoryInfo does not work with absolute paths on Windows #88596
  • [HTTP/2] `HttpClient` never sends GOAWAY frame #88593
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce asynchronous version of RateLimiter.GetStatistics #88592
  • Port System.Linq documentation from .NET 8.0 APIs #88589
    8.0.0
  • Port System.Cloud documentation from .NET 8.0 APIs #88588
    8.0.0
  • behavior of [:XX:] inside a regex range has changed #88587
  • Test failure readytorun/GenericCycleDetection/Depth3Test/Depth3Test.sh #88586
  • Test failure baseservices/threading/regressions/13662/13662-b/13662-b.cmd #88585
  • Test failure readytorun/HardwareIntrinsics/X86/CpuId_R2R_Avx/CpuId_R2R_Avx.sh #88582
  • Test failure JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/X86/X86Base/CpuId_r/X86_CpuId_r.dll #88581
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Tests.Vectors.Vector512Tests.Vector512IsHardwareAcceleratedTest #88580
  • Test failure Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Unit.Test.EmitterTests.ProduceDiagnosticFromOtherAssemblyTest #88579
  • Port System.Threading documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88578
  • Port System.Text.Json documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88577
    8.0.0
  • Port System.Text documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88576
    8.0.0
  • Port System.Security documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88575
    8.0.0
  • Port System.Runtime.Intrinsics documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88574
    8.0.0
  • Port System.Runtime.InteropServices documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88573
    8.0.0
  • Port System.Reflection documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88571
    8.0.0
  • Port System.Numerics documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88570
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Generator does not warn on invalid uses of GeneratedComClassAttribute #87137
  • Can't call NativeLibrary.GetExport with RTLD_DEFAULT on Linux #71881
    8.0.0
  • [Wasm] Profiled AOT fails on System.IO invocations #87856
  • WebAssembly Blazor Breakpoint stopping after it is removed. #72663
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] System.Collections.Tests Unimplemented opcode 2428 .i2 #85145
    8.0.0
  • Blazor - Ternary operator crashes #85597
  • Scheduled tasks stop working after 2023.04.14 1:41:36 UTC #85473
    7.0.x
  • [WASM] Blazor Application crashes after 15 minutes #85774
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][7.0] Blazor Wasm debugger not working anymore #87407
    7.0.x
  • Test failure baseservices/TieredCompilation/BasicTest_QuickJitForLoopsOn/BasicTest_QuickJitForLoopsOn.sh #88583
    8.0.0
  • Build break in Mono Android extra-platforms #88344
    8.0.0
  • Create experimental wasi-wasm runtime pack workloads #80786
    8.0.0
  • Fix the boxing when using the LoggerMessage.Define is used and values are converted ToString #50768
    Future
  • can't dotnet run x86 at x64 on net8 #88283
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/processinfo3/processinfo3/processinfo3.sh #88225
    8.0.0
  • SslStream can get stuck on large transfers with TLS 1.3 #88495
    8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] "Arg storage type not yet supported" on specific P/Invoke method signature #82976
  • Integrating .NET 8 WebAssembly project into the Angular app #88545
  • Proxy authentication not recognized in macOS #86322
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] ObjectWriter for MacOS should be built and published from the Main branch #87644
    8.0.0
  • Infra improvements for Helix #68176
    8.0.0
  • CoreCLR tests build fails with `skipmanaged` option #85170
  • [wasm] Perf pipeline completely broken #88534
    8.0.0
  • Strange behaviur when registering Open Generics inside DI container #88192
  • Inspecting private members of RegistryKey in debugger causes it to be disposed #88556
  • why Newtonsoft.Json too big when build native aot #88600
  • Example of building and testing libraries doesn't work #87367
  • [browser] multiple dotnet runtimes on the same page #87280
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Numerics.Tests.Matrix4x4Tests.Matrix4x4CreateShadowTest02 #83316
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] GC events don't get logged on Linux #87445
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2218291 #88636
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [wasm][debugger]Fix hotreload tests #88635
    area-Debugger-mono
  • WIP: [Mono] Add dotnet-gcdump support. #88634
    area-Tracing-mono
  • [NativeAOT] A few scalability fixes for the fat Lock #88633
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix regex for helix retries when chrome fails to launch #88632
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add more docs for new COM source generator types #88627
    documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] UnsafeAccessorAttribute non-generic support for field #88626
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Ensure that the CpuId tests set preferredVectorByteLength to a non-zero value #88623
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [API Proposal]: Create array from array type #88620
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Update to 22.04 queues #88619
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • wrap exceptions from callbacks in QuicError.CallbackError #88614
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Fix options source gen with non-accessible validation attributes #88613
    area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Do not use `RhGetCodeTarget` in delegate equality #88611
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable STJ reflection by default on AOT publish #88609
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Enable finalizer events for EventPipe #88604
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Add coreclr_shutdown to mono #88594
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Remove stub of special treatment for POSIX char ranges #88590
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix Position and Seek for MemoryStream with custom origin #88572
    area-System.IO, community-contribution

Merged

  • [mono] Precompute the CallInfo structure used by the mono_arch_..nati… #88369
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][aot] Avoid prefer-ing gsharedvt versions of AsyncMethodBuilder… #87990
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Disable mark list optimization if we hit a per region mark list overflow (#86508) #87339
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.10
  • Add Support For Multiplexing `System.Diagnostics.Metrics` for `Dotnet Monitor` and `Dotnet Counters` #86504
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging][wasm] CI: Fix EAT/AOT tests build #87546
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Work around for Android builds using GCC for cross compiler native tools build #88345
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Disable failing HotReload tests #88630
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Reduce boxing in logging #88560
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • [Release/7.0-staging] Allow GetILFunctionBody for dynamic methods #87598
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.10
  • [release/7.0-staging][wasm][debugger] Improve debugger performance #88602
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add C library detection to processinfo3 test #88260
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] Revert Deflater/Inflater changes around SafeHandle initialization #88153
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.x
  • [wasm] Update PackedSimd API #88595
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • [mono][interp] Add support for missing argument storage type on arm64 #88606
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging][mono][debugger] Showing "Frame not in module" after vscode-js-debug bump on VS #88336
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.11
  • [release/6.0-staging][mono][debugger] Showing "Frame not in module" after vscode-js-debug bump on VS #88351
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.21
  • fix IsMutuallyAuthenticated with NegotiateClientCertificateAsync #88488
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Fix CoreCLR tests build with skipmanaged option #88321
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • fix processing of TLS renegotiation #88511
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Fix crash happening due to invalid pointer to free() #86868
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Missing symbol crash fix #86864
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • [libs][Unix][perf] Lazily initialize TimeZoneInfo names and order GetSystemTimeZones by Ids #88368
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Convert RegistryKey.SystemKeyHandle to method #88591
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2217623 #88506
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix example of building a library. #87398
    documentation, area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Ensure that NI_Vector_Dot is always handled as TYP_SIMD #88447
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Internalize assetUniqueQuery as modulesUniqueQuery #88329
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] [jiterp] Use wasm if opcode for null checks and conditional branches #88114
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [RISC-V] Disable Inline TLS field access on RISC-V #88584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix missing GC events on non-Windows for nativeaot #88282
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Expose IUtf8SpanParsable and implement it on the primitive numeric types #86875
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter thread safety infrastructure #88279
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • #78303 Add transformation ~v1 & v2 to VectorXxx.AndNot(v1, v2) #81993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not say the wrong default behavior for blittable arrays in ComInterfaceGenerator warning #88212
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • GetTotalPauseDuration implementation (#68835) #87143
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.10
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write/Copy, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add public MethodInvoker and ConstructorInvoker classes #88415
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • EventPipe support for ProcessInfo #87562
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Use latest chrome for testing #88505
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add Keyed Services Support to Dependency Injection #87183
    blocking, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Light up core ASCII.Utility methods with Vector256/Vector512 code paths. #88532
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add some xml comments #88433
    area-Meta
  • Respect IsDynamicCodeSupported in more places in Linq.Expressions #88539
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Use RegDeleteTree in RegistryKey.DeleteSubKeyTree #82598
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Mark final types as exact #88163
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Unnecessary sign-extension for `(nuint)span.Length` #88136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Vector128.ShuffleUnsafe #88559
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Poolable / Resettable CBOR Readers #88104
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Formats.Cbor, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Optimize GetType with known type #87579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ensure GCHeap related debugging still works even when we use newer CLRGC to target older runtimes #88457
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono][threads] save/restore errno in thread state transitions #79856
    area-VM-threading-mono, 8.0.0
  • Added QuicException.TransportErrorCode #88550

  • [browser][mt] Release all proxies of C# and JS objects on WebWorker #88052
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Improve byte array allocations with ArrayPool #88551
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Improve debugger performance based on JMC #86982
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Accelerating Vector512.Sum() #87851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve updating classes for generics #88277
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Enabled embedded broadcast for binary ops #87946
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • add test for SslClientAuthenticationOptions.ShallowClone #88557

    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Perform the class init at runtime when static fields of BEFORE_FIELD_INIT type are accessed #86787
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-10
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Stub out hybrid globalization #2337

Updated

  • ManagedZLib Experiment #2325
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: For the msbuild exec task, don't assume a working directory #2334
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add a portable implementation of RhGetCodeTarget #2333

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Windows Update repeatedly reinstalls .NET version 5.0.17 #33887
  • Container documentation leads to undecipherable MSBuild errors with .NET 8 #33885

Closed

  • GenAPI emits default constructors when reading from metadata #32165

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure GenAPI doesn't emit reserved attributes #33888
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #33886
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 20.5.0 in /eng/dependabot #33874
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 20.5.0 in /eng/dependabot #33873
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

Merged

  • Add explicit System.Text.Json dependency #33618
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add tests for disabling JsonSerializer.IsReflectionEnabledByDefault on `PublishTrimmed=true` #33757
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #33852
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Handle when the target graph is TF/RID to pull out the TF piece #33863
    untriaged
  • Tool install global command: Download tool packages from nuget when installing global tools #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Update the existing NETSDK 1045 error message to link to the download page #33446
    Servicing-consider
  • WIP: Add name argument for dotnet new #33810
    untriaged, Area-Templates
  • Unblock sln add for a shared project #33837
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Stabilize branding for the 7.0.400 release #33862
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers: sync CreateNewImageToolTask with new CreateNewImage properties. #33765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Containers] Enable multi-RID and multi-project containerization #33166
    untriaged, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-10
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: Semi-Auto-Properties; `field` keyword #140
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Change ref safety errors to warnings in unsafe contexts #6476
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Interceptors #7009
  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113
    Working Set

PullRequests

Updated

  • Emit `ref readonly` parameters in function pointers without `modreq(In)` #7307

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add an API to discover if an attribute is a reserved attribute #68968
  • SyntaxGenerator ignores "scoped" keyword #68959
  • SyntaxGenerator does not support `unmanaged` generic constraint nor `init` properties #68957
  • CA1062 stumbles when pattern-matching with `[]` #68955
  • VS 2022 is reformatting C# code when uncommenting a block #68953
  • CS0029 when method has [DoesNotReturn] #68949

Closed

  • IncrementalGenerator caches ReferencedAssemblySymbols too aggressively #66341
    17.7
  • Test 'TargetTests.CompilerApiVersionIsSet' fails locally #68961
    17.8
  • Organize Imports command handler should apply changes using async progress UI #68921
  • unsafe ref and pointer diagnostics should be errors in pre-C# 11 #68958
  • Duplicate variable declaration allowed #68583
    17.7
  • Verify change to AssemblyLoading_DependencyInDifferentDirectory_Delete test #60766
    17.7
  • `AssemblyLoading_DependencyInDifferentDirectory_Delete` fails locally #61451
    17.7
  • Primary constructor parameter assignment in initializers uses wrong nullable warning #67099
    C# 12.0
  • Function breakpoints not resolved on module load when no symbols loaded #22316
    Next

PullRequests

Created

  • Honor Concord's TruncatedString flag to reduce memory usage #68969
    Area-Interactive, Community, untriaged
  • Fix missing duplicate diagnostic for enum declarations #68967
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #68966
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Disallow test compositions with include/exclude parts overlapping #68965
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix assertion failure in semantic model for file-local extension methods #68962
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Unmanaged type parameter generation #68960
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move several value types over to being records #68956
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Translate `ref readonly` in new synthetic call factory and unskip arglist tests #68951
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Misc improvements of OneOrMany #68948
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Fix incremental build issue with CompilerApiVersion #68964
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Switch 'organize imports' to use the lightweight background wait indicator #68924
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove option that ab test has concluded on. #68954
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2218061 #68963
  • Allow function breakpoints before module symbols are loaded #67600
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • External Access EditorConfig generation #68896
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update License.txt to MIT #68942
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Report nullable safety warnings (vs. "W"-warnings) for assignments to captured primary constructor parameters. #68931
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors, Next
  • Merge `main` into `features/RefReadonly` #68950
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Relax parameter-argument modifier matching for ref readonly parameters #68224
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0

Updated

  • Remove host specific args from CommandLineArgs #68918
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow client to configure language for resources #68739
    Area-IDE, LSP, untriaged
  • Force public APIs to return complete results #68804
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve sequence point placement in primary constructors and records #68765
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • 🧹 Declare MEF dependencies of VisualStudioWorkspace #54377
    Area-IDE
  • Improve detection of ambiguous type-or-value receiver when it possibly refers to a captured primary constructor parameter #68914
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge latest bits from `main` into `roles` feature branch #68928
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement simple LSP run tests #68889
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Enhance the SARIF v2 log to report analyzer execution time #68607
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Emit modopt for ref readonly parameters in function pointers #68728
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Fix lossy error message when lexer encounters certain characters #68919
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add filePath when generates new Document in MoveTypeEditor #68900
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add fuzzer for incremental generators #68903
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Source generators/track values etw #68830
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Break individual string literals into multiple spell checking spans for all the individual words within them. #68909
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Relax ref readonly parameter signature matching #68680
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Warn on shadowing primary constructor parameter by a member from base #68864
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to route to Blazor component pages in the client assembly #49313

Merged

  • Update SDK #49297

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tracing GC on iOS yields mono_coop_cond_signal Cannot transition thread 0x2016c7280 from STATE_BLOCKING with DO_BLOCKING #16080
  • Image only Aspect fill #16076
  • Azure Pipelines Fails in the Restore Nuget Step on the solution when the solution has a Test project associated with it. #16075
  • Including specific android libraries via nuget causes AOT failures on RELEASE build #16074
  • Picker selected index is always 0 on load! #16073
  • Right click to 'Archive for Publishing' iOS projects with native binding projects fail due to Android OS versions #16072
  • [Bug] [Windows] File Picker Crashes After File Not Found #16068
  • Allow Changing AppShell at runtime #16067
  • [WinUI] .Net MAUI CollectionView with SelectionMode=Multiple shows tick marks without obvious way to remove them #16066
  • When border is added as Content the Desired Size Height is not updated properly when changing at runtime. #16064
    Backlog
  • .Net MAUI CollectionView slows down when SectionHeadersPinToVisibleBounds is true in iOS platform . #16062
  • Slider MinimumTrackColor has no effect on Windows #16056
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Android]Can't tap with Frame in CollectionView on Android #7121
    .NET 8
  • Blank .NET MAUI App shows "Spelling error - Semibold is not a word" #16069
  • Collection View Header and Empty View not showing on Android when ItemSource is null #8934
    .NET 8
  • Accessibility Insights reports E_UNEXPECTED error when accessing the text from a .NET MAUI Editor control #9893
    Backlog
  • WebView clears all other control elements rendered before it into blank #12734
    Backlog
  • [WinUI] No way to change the `TextColor` for the `Switch` control #16047
  • Set up an Azure Devops image with maui pre-installed, as this would reduce CI times for most users significantly #16052
  • Blue screen when using the latest version of VS, generating Release or distributing Android #15706
  • 在Resources设置Label的VerticalTextAlignment属性导致程序崩溃,报错Value does not fall within the expected range. #14003

PullRequests

Created

  • Prevent Android timer from adding multiple callbacks; #16078

  • [Windows] Fix Slider MinimumTrackColor (#16056) #16057
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-slider

Updated

  • Replace MessagingCenter in AlertManager #12910
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, platform/tizen, control-dialog
  • Make Add/Remove Logical public #16046
  • Wrap Image with a grid on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #15122
    area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • Move most controls to use ModifyMapping (and variants) #15058
  • Set the SafeAreaInset Property with updated value #15512
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Fix Graphics Font comparison method #15985
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Start docs for UITesting #15836
    area/testing
  • Add GotoAsync overload for single use query parameters #15585
    area/shell 🐢
  • Improve the customization of WebView on Android #16032
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Use AppendToMapping for Element and VisualElement #14948
  • Use Frame command to recalc span bounds #15168
    area/controls 🎮
  • Windows Device tests for CI #15629
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, area/testing
  • [Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing #14861
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, community ✨
  • Android: fix dialog button colors in dark mode #15091
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-dialogalert, s/pr-needs-author-input

Created
